org.hypergraphdb.indexing

Class HGValueIndexer<KeyType,ValueType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hypergraphdb.indexing.HGValueIndexer<KeyType,ValueType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HGIndexer<KeyType,ValueType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TargetToTargetIndexer

    public abstract class HGValueIndexer<KeyType,ValueType>
extends java.lang.Object
implements HGIndexer<KeyType,ValueType>

    An indexer that not only determines the key in an index entry, but the value as well. By default, HGKeyIndexer implementation provide a key by which to index HyperGraph atoms. In other words, atoms are the "default" values for index entries. A HGValueIndexer provides also the value in an index entry in cases where it is not the atom itself.

      • getKey

        public abstract KeyType getKey(HyperGraph graph,
             java.lang.Object atom)

        Returns an index key for the given atom.

        Parameters:
        graph - The current HyperGraph instance.
        atom - The atom being indexed.
        Returns:
        The index key. If the return value is not a byte[], a non-null ByteArrayConverter must be provided by the getConverter method.
